DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether injection botulinum toxin Type A bladder safe effective treat overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Must 1885 year old Must diagnose his/her doctor overactive bladder least 6 month ago Must weigh least 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Must willing able record information regard bladder function diary ( provide ) Must willing able complete entire course study Can currently catheterize way control incontinence Must use botulinum toxin type A botulinum toxin previously condition
